DOC.brief_summary: This protocol compare 24 hour glucose control subject take saxagliptin metformin extend release ( XR ) versus metformin XR alone
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study Subjects That Are Taking Saxagliptin Added Onto Metformin XR Compared Subjects Taking Metformin XR Alone
DOC.criteria: ≥18 ≤77yearsold Type 2 diabetes Taking metformin immediate release ( IR ) XR ≥1500 mg least 8 week monotherapy Glycosylated hemoglobin ( A1C ) ≥7 % ≤10 % Body mass index ( BMI ) ≤40 kg/m2 Women childbearing potential unable unwilling use acceptable birth control Women pregnant breastfeeding Significant cardiovascular history Active liver disease Renal impairment
